item.title: One Hour. One Massive Pizza. Let’s Go
item.description: What was supposed to be a 16-inch pizza challenge turned into a survival test. The crust was heavy, the sausage undercooked, but I wasn’t about to quit.

media:content.media:title: One Hour. One Massive Pizza. Let’s Go
media:content.media:description: What was supposed to be a 16-inch pizza challenge turned into a survival test. The crust was heavy, the sausage undercooked, but I wasn’t about to quit.

item.title: 9 Pounds Of Tacos On The Table… Could You Do It?
item.description: A mountain of tacos hits the table in this challenge. With 9 pounds to get through and the clock ticking, will determination be enough to finish?

item.title: 30 Minutes To Tackle Indiana’s Biggest Tacos
item.description: Watch as the ultimate food challenge unfolds - 30 minutes on the clock, and only the hungriest contender can take on Indiana’s biggest tacos.
